Name: !dangeroussexy
Miss: Your enemies identify you immediately as their foremost threat!
Hit:
Hold 1. Spend 1 hold to: 
* make eye contact with an NPC present, who freezes or flinches and can't take action until you break it off.
Crit:
Hold 2. Spend 1 hold to: 
* make eye contact with an NPC present, who freezes or flinches and can't take action until you break it off.

Name: !visionsofdeath
Miss: You forsee your own death, and take -1 throughout the battle
Hit: Name one NPC who'll die OR one NPC who'll live. The MC will make your visions come true, if it's even remotely possible
Crit: Name one person who'll die OR one person who'll live
